name: Open Universiteit in the Netherlands
goal: The OUNL develops and provides open higher distance and online education. There is a special focus on the use of new information technologies and of teaching and learning methods to provide effective, efficient, attractive and accessible lifelong learning facilities and education to the Dutch citizens.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Culture, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and innovation
euInitiatives:
The Open University of the Netherlands (OUNL) supports the EU Modernisation and Internationalisation Agenda for Higher Education, and the Erasmus Charter for Higher Education is integral to the realisation of OUNL's institutional vision, plans and strategies.
We believe that open higher distance and online education is a power for good and makes a significant contribution to the society and whole world. We are committed to international excellence through the creation of world-changing research and high quality, innovative teaching and learning within an inclusive academic culture.
The OUNL was founded in 1983 as a university for open distance education. Soon thereafter, the OUNLâ€™s Educational Expertise Centre was commissioned by the Ministry of Education to provide an innovative stimulus to Dutch Higher Education by carrying out research and development work on technology enhanced learning. One of its results has been the development of an educational modelling language (EML), which in a slightly modified form was adopted by the IMS consortium as one of its specifications (IMS Learning Design). IMS LD is a language for modelling learning scenarios of any kind in machine readable, portable ways.
The OU is active in the following EU programs:

Horizon 2020
